Eric Schmidt also challenged the assertion that Google is locked in a competitive battle with Facebook.`` We have a competitor called Microsoft,'' he said. Microsoft has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day. Facebook, on the other hand,`` has clearly stated they don't want to get into the search business. Facebook users tend to use Google search.
